message: @JohnFail That's what I do on my Windows 7 box: VMWare with linux for development.  Works like a charm
i would think it easy to find if there's a ubiquitous such solution: check the other services the twitter clients etc you like support.

Is there a utility supported ubiquitously like Instapaper but with search (as Read It Later has) or like Read It Later, but with categories (like Instapaper has)? And not Evernote. Twitter clients can’t save to Evernote unless it’s done clumsily.
beyond that, you might look into using Instapaper with Pinboard, which has full-text search when you get the archiving feature http://pinboard.in/upgrade/
@ericflo Nice,though I'm guessing that was meant for my VMware thread, haha.
